description: Make this flavourful pork and jalapeno pizza with honey drizzle and classic pizza sauce for a sophisticated flavour sensation.
name: Pork, Jalapeño & Honey Pizzas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 cup plain flour (plus extra for dusting)
500g pork & fennel sausages, cases removed and discarded

recipeInstructions.text: To make the pizza dough, add yeast to 1 3/4 cups warm water in a jug and stand for 5 minutes. Place flour in a bowl with salt flakes, then add yeast mixture and stir to combine. Knead dough for 10 minutes or until smooth and elastic, then cover and leave to proof in a warm place for 30 minutes. Divide dough into four portions.

Preheat oven to 240°C/220°C fan-forced. Heat oil in large frying pan over medium-high heat. Cut sausages into pieces and add to pan. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 5 minutes or until browned. Set aside.

Roll out each dough portion on a floured surface to a 25cm round. Place each round on a baking paper-lined baking tray. Spread pizza sauce over bases, leaving a 1cm border. Top bases with half the cheese, and divide sausage and jalapeno among bases. Top with remaining cheese.
Bake pizzas, in 2 batches, for 15 minutes or until bases are golden and cooked through. Top pizzas with kale and drizzle with honey, then slice and serve.
